Accuracy and Fluidity.
Team Play and Individual skills. 
Grace and Power. 
The summersault, when the ball slams into the back of the net.
When the magic of it all comes with a pair of keyboards or joysticks, it's just hard to resist. 

The latest edition in FIFA series is the fastest selling sports game ever. FIFA 12 has received high critical acclaim 'One of the most refined, polished and compelling takes on the beautiful game and arguably of any given sport.'
 Fast paced and with various skills and tricks to be mastered, this game has been a regular at gaming events since release. The soul and passion of the people's game is translated into FIFA. Though games are short - they are competitive and fun to watch, even by non-gamers. Score the most goals and kick your way to victory at this Blitzkrieg!!!

1. Registration fee is Rs. 60/- per participant. Tathva registration is
compulsory.Registration will be closed after prelims.
2. NFS and FIFA together can be registered for Rs 100/­ per participant
3. All games will be Classic 1 vs 1 in multiplayer mode.
4. There will be no practicing allowed. Participants are only allowed to change the
necessary controls and check them.
5. Joysticks and other game controllers will be provided.
6. The total number of rounds will be decided by the participation.
7. All rounds will follow usual knockout procedure.
8. In case of a draw, the match is restarted with the golden goal rule (Same teams must
be selected).
9. In case of unintentional disconnection, the admin will decide on how to proceed. In
the game is within halftime and no goals have been scored, the game will be
restarted with same teams for a fulltime game. If not, the game will be played for the
remaining time based on at what time it disconnected with scores being carried over.
10. If at any time, a player intentionally disconnects/exits the game he/she will be
disqualified. In case of alttabbing ­ the admin will decide whether it was intentional or
a mistake and what action must be taken with disqualification being the maximum
penalty.
11. Teams can be either clubs or countries according to user's will.
12. The first and second rounds will be classic 4 minute half timematches. The rest will
all be 6 minute ones. Final match will be made a best of three.
13. The administrator's decision will be final.
